code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LocationSummary=_ref=>{let{locationData}=_ref;if(!locationData)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"location-summary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"summary-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Location Found"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"location-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Location:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:locationData.location})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Postcode:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:locationData.postcode})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Coordinates:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[locationData.latitude.toFixed(4),", ",locationData.longitude.toFixed(4)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Method:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:locationData.type==='postcode'?'Postcode':locationData.type==='geolocation'?'Current Location':'City Selection'})]})]})]})});};export default LocationSummary;
